original_title: 少女☆歌劇 レヴュースタァライト ―The STAGE 中等部― Rebellion
overview: Shōjo☆Kageki Revue Starlight -The STAGE Junior High- Rebellion (少女☆歌劇 レヴュースタァライト -The STAGE 中等部- Rebellion; Shōjo☆Kageki Revue Starlight -The STAGE Chūtō-bu- Rebellion) is an upcoming stage play to be presented at HIKOSEN Theater in Tokyo between June 7 to 12, 2023.
title: Revue Starlight ―The STAGE Junior High― Rebellion
